characters.story: A machine of trees and threads sings "Ji!" cheerfully - an opportunity clicking like an abacus!
To sever threads with ax commands "Dwan!" sharply - Gimli cutting silk in the factory!
To carry on silk rice commands "Ji!" sharply, inheriting the thread!
Obvious thread appears, bending down drooping saying "Shian" - conspicuous to all!
"Yueh!" The white tree commanded music sharply - melodies sang with joy!
Medicine grass music commands "Yao!" sharply - herbs that cure and heal!
A chicken bird sings "Ji!" cheerfully - part griffin, part turkey!
"What, me?" says the hemp thread neutrally, questioning at sentence's end!
Lineage silk held commands "Shi!" sharply - connection through generations!
"Shi!" The person's lineage commanded sharply - they were related by connection!
"Sun!" The child on the family line sang cheerfully - a grandson continuing the thread!
"Chueh!" Divination commanded withdrawal sharply - retreat, yet stand firm!
A foot of flesh bends down drooping saying "Jiao" at the base!
"Foo, what clothing should I wear?" The moon and hand questioned apparel curiously.
Fate's mouth opens, commanding "Ming!" sharply - life's destiny spoken!
"Lyo, should I remain here?" The field questioned whether to stay, detained.
"Lyo!" On the water they sang cheerfully, sliding away, skating and slipping!
"Liao, want to talk more?" The ear questioned how to chat curiously, passing time!
Willow tree bends down drooping like "Lyo" - branches swaying gently!
"Ling!" The seal stamped orders sharply - the decree was issued!
Cold ice orders bend down drooping saying "Leng" - frozen and chilled!
Zero rain orders question "Ling? Nothing left?" curiously empty!
A collar at the neck bends down drooping saying "Ling" - usher forward by the lead!
To communicate on pogo stick sings "Tong!" cheerfully bouncing - common passage through!
